General.Name: Gambling.com Group Ltd
General.Description: Gambling.com Group Limited operates as a performance marketing company for the online gambling industry worldwide. The company provides digital marketing services for the iGaming and sports betting. It publishes various branded websites, including Gambling.com, Bookies.com, RotoWire.com, and BonusFinder.com. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Saint Helier, Jersey.
General.Address: 22 Grenville Street, Saint Helier, Jersey, JE4 8PX
